SELECT tatob.storeno, tatob.store_name, tatob.employee_no, tatob.employee_name, ifnull(bb.num,0) new_10_count, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) as year , MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) as month , NOW() as createtime FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT employee_no , employee_name , df_storeno AS storeno ,df_store_name AS store_name FROM tmp_order_pubseas_monthly WHERE df_ispubseas =1 AND employee_no is not null AND df_signed_time >=#{begindate} AND df_signed_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) tatob LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t_store_custom.employee_no, t_store_custom.employee_name, t_store_custom.storeno, count(t_store_custom.customer_id) num FROM ( SELECT t_m1.store_id, t_m1.customer_id, t_m1.employee_no, t_m1.employee_name, t_m1.storeno FROM ( SELECT tor.store_id, tor.customer_id, tor.trading_price, topm.employee_no, topm.employee_name, topm.df_storeno as storeno FROM t_eshop te JOIN t_order tor ON (te.id=tor.eshop_id) JOIN tmp_order_pubseas_monthly topm ON( tor.id = topm.df_order_id AND topm.df_ispubseas =1 AND topm.employee_no is not null) JOIN df_order_flow tof ON (tor.id=tof.order_id AND tof.order_status='signed' AND tof.create_time>=DATE(#{begindate}) AND tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)) WHERE te.`name` NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND te.white!='QA' GROUP BY tor.store_id,tor.customer_id HAVING SUM(tor.trading_price)>10.0 ) t_m1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tor_in.store_id, tor_in.customer_id FROM t_eshop te_in JOIN t_order tor_in ON (te_in.id=tor_in.eshop_id ) JOIN df_order_flow tof_in ON (tor_in.id=tof_in.order_id AND tof_in.order_status='signed' AND tof_in.create_time<DATE(#{begindate})) WHERE te_in.`name` NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND te_in.white!='QA' GROUP BY tor_in.store_id,tor_in.customer_id ) t_old ON (t_m1.store_id=t_old.store_id AND t_m1.customer_id=t_old.customer_id) WHERE t_old.store_id IS NULL ) t_store_custom GROUP BY t_store_custom.employee_no ) bb ON (bb.employee_no = tatob.employee_no)
employee_no in (${employee_no})
